articles.title: Ask the gardener: Your questions about ‘Leaving the Leaves’ answered
articles.description:
I have decided to dedicate a second column to the concept of “Leaving the Leaves” in your yard this fall.

The post Ask the gardener: Your questions about ‘Leaving the Leaves’ answered appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Learn how leaving leaves can benefit local ecosystems this fall.
Gardener emphasizes reducing waste and improving soil health for Boston yards.
Residents can enhance biodiversity by allowing leaves to decompose naturally.
